document_data.title: Region
document_data.name: Deep Wastes
document_data.caption: ''Heroes trek through the Deep Wastes.''
document_data.mainbody: The '''Deep Wastes''' formed a small domain part of the vast [[Underdark]] hidden away underneath the surface of the [[Dalelands]] and the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Geography: Stretching from the [[Earthspur Mountains]] with few entrances from the surface, a large portion of the Deep Wastes remained unexplored by travelers of the more adventurous type.
document_data.Inhabitants: The region was sparsely populated due to the collapse of the [[drow]] city of [[Maerimydra]] which once held [[Shadowdale]] as a conquered surface land. Around [[1372 DR]], the abandoned drow city was in ruins.
